meta.description: Optimize the selection of food items to meet nutritional requirements at minimum cost.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Available food items to choose from.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content per unit of each food item.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content per unit of each food item.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content per unit of each food item.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units to purchase for each food item.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 87 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrate_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 135 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1926 calories are consumed.
